attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please do not proliforate nuclear arms.Instead,spend the money to be used for replacing Trident,on improving the lives of our British citizens.Poverty,unemployment,environment,children,schooling,healthcare,elderly.Lets use the money to help people,not threatening to destroy them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
